casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Ferrante Vermond PERRY No. 381P18 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 5, 2018 T. Hill Davis, III, Assistant Attorney General, Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, Andrew Murray, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina Ferante Vermond Perry, for Perry, Ferrante Vermond.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 29th of October 2018 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the Superior Court, Mecklenburg County, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court of that County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of December 2018."

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 29th of October 2018 by Defendant to Proceed In Forma Pauperis:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of December 2018."
